VirMach: Three year anniversary + Independence Day Sale!

atlanta, buffalo, chicago, dallas, Frankfurt, los angeles, pheonix, san jose, seattle July 4, 2017 @ 12:38 pm, by Matt Zelasko

Hello everyone! Amir from VirMach recently sent in some deals in celebration of their 3 year anniversary and Independence Day and we think they’ll be pretty interesting to most of you.

VirMach has been featured here several times and they usually get great reviews. They’re a registered company in the USA ID 3512454410, their WHOIS is public, and you have find their ToS/Legal Docs here. They accept PayPal, Credit/Debit cards, and BitCoin as payment.

In their own words:

We’re celebrating our three year anniversary with some exciting offers. All plans featured are on Dual E5 servers with RAID 10 SSDs, as well as some new features since you last saw us. DDoS protection is available for free in New York and our new Voxility DDoS filtered IP is available for free as well (after discount) in Los Angeles. Since our launch, we’ve expanded to ten total locations in the US and Europe and are planning new location launches by the end of the year.

Here’s the deals:

Budget+ OpenVZ (Limited Quantity)
– 256MB RAM
– 1x vCPU @ 1GHz
– 15GB SSD space
– 250GB transfer
– 1Gbps uplink
– 1x IPv4
– OpenVZ/SolusVM
– Coupon: LEB2017B
– $6/year
– Order Now!

Each coupon can be used (1) time per client. Offers are limited and may expire at any time.
